alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 31 at 9:11PM MST until August 31 at 10:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 1030 PM MST. * At 911 PM MST, severe winds associated with thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Cave Creek to near Peoria to near Litchfield Park, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Scottsdale, Peoria, Surprise, Goodyear, El Mirage, Youngtown, New River, Sun City West, Sun City, Waddell, Litchfield Park, Cave Creek, and Carefree. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 211 and 228. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 11 and 15. US Highway 60 between mile markers 139 and 150. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 10 and 33. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 24 and 30. AZ Route 303 between mile markers 106 and 139. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
